Event_Adventure_SpringMarket_Content1: It's the time of Spring when flowers bloom, and everything comes back to life. People gather together and rejoice...
Event_Adventure_SpringMarket_Content2:
During the Town Fair, this place is crowded with people.
Frequent sounds of peddling and shouting can be heard from afar...
Event_Adventure_SpringMarket_Content3: Merchant Groups also took this opportunity to open up stalls in here.
Event_Adventure_SpringMarket_Content4: And carriages and horses of the major merchant groups can be seen all over the place.
Event_BuddhistMonkSkill3_SelectFeature:
At this moment,
{0} witnessed golden light erupting around them, and heard the unending sounds of Sanskrit.
All sorts of deeds from their past life flashed in {1}'s mind, and as the saying goes, “Both good and bad karma circulates”.
As a senior monk who reached an enlightenment, now reincarnated, {2}'s is responsible for the karma of their past life, receiving the fruits of their karma in this life...
Event_CrossArchive_CanNotDreamBack_Conte:
Because the record of when they first arrived to the Taiwu Village was lost,
{0} cannot return to their dreams and make up for their regrets...
Event_CrossArchive_ConfirmMerge_Content: The dream is over, and I will become one with the Taiwu of the past...
Event_CrossArchive_ConfirmMerge_Title: Sword and Me Return to One
Event_CrossArchive_DoNotDreamBack_Conten:
If you choose "I Have no Regrets", Taiwu's journey will end here, and Taiwu's world will cease to exist...

Are you sure you want to choose "I Have no Regrets"?
Event_CrossArchive_LoseCombatSkill_Conte: All the Martial Arts learned by {0} have been abolished and scattered here...
Event_CrossArchive_LoseInventory_Content: All the resources, items, equipment, etc. held by {0} have been placed here with their luggage...
Event_CrossArchive_LoseLifeSkill_Content: All the Fine Arts learned by {0} have been eliminated and scattered here...
Event_CrossArchive_LoseMemory_Content: All experiences, people and things that {0} had known have been sealed in here...
Event_DateAdventure_Shoulder: Gently rests their head on <Character key=RoleTaiwu str=Name/>'s shoulder
Event_ExtraProfessionSkill_SelectFeature:
I remember my journey around the Jianghu, all the beautiful and horrific sights i saw, and all the experiences with the coldness and warmth of the human nature...

Today, {0} reminisced about their past, remembering all the things they went through and all the difficulties they experienced while wandering Jianghu pursuing their ambitions.
And at some point, while lost in thought, they unconsciously realized the truth about their own nature...
Event_FiveLoongDlc_LoongKeeper_Word1:
"To subdue the Divine Dragons, there must be a secret.
The two of us spend days and night on studying the secret method of subduing the dragon, but we don't know if we'll be able to succeed..."
Event_FiveLoongDlc_LoongKeeper_Word2:
"This method of subduing the Divine Dragons is really hard to believe!
Alas... I have no idea what to do, I don't know what to do. It's better to let this matter go..."
Event_FiveLoongDlc_LoongKeeper_Word3: "After staying for so long in the Taiwu Village, the two of us are so comfortable..."
Event_FiveLoongDlc_LoongKeeper_Word4:
"The two of us go out occasionally, conquer the little dragons, and see the scenery everywhere.
I just feel that Taiwu Village is still simple, clean and comfortable..."
Event_FiveLoongDlc_LoongKeeper_Word5:
"I haven't thanked you enough. Not only did you help me, but you also allowed us to live in Taiwu Village forever.
Alas... we have rarely experienced this kind of tenderness in this world before..."
Event_FiveLoongDlc_LoongKeeper_Word6:
"You are running around outside every day.
You have to shoulder heavy responsibilities and have to subdue the Divine Dragons.
It is really hard to do it. But I have no skills and can't help you. I can only hope that you take care and don't get too tired..."
Event_FiveLoongDlc_Nurturance0:
The rocks here are arched and the water is turquoise.
A few thin willow orchid plants are planted along the pond, attracting birds to rest and hover from time to time...
Event_FiveLoongDlc_Nurturance1:
The rocks here are arched and the water is turquoise.
A few thin willow orchid plants are planted along the pond, attracting birds to rest and hover from time to time.
Several boy servants by the pool are methodically selecting and cooking medicinal materials, and then pouring various decoctions into the Jiao Pond one by one...
Event_FiveLoongDlc_Nurturance2:
The rocks here are arched and the water is turquoise.
A few thin willow orchid plants are planted along the pond, attracting birds to rest and hover from time to time.
Several child servants by the pool are constantly putting various ingredients and delicacies into the pool...
Event_FiveLoongDlc_Nurturance3:
The rocks here are arched and the water is turquoise.
A few thin willow orchid plants are planted along the pond, attracting birds to rest and hover from time to time.
Iron bars were added to the outside of the pool to lock all kinds of ferocious birds and beasts in the center, chasing each other and fighting each other...
Event_FiveLoongDlc_Nurturance4:
The rocks here are arched and the water is turquoise.
A few thin willow orchid plants are planted along the pond, attracting birds to rest and hover from time to time.
There are piles of water and jade beads in the pond... all kinds of treasures, exquisite and lovely, attracting the sun and the moon...
Event_FiveLoongDlc_Nurturance5:
The rocks here are arched and the water is turquoise.
A few thin willow orchid plants are planted along the pond, attracting birds to rest and hover from time to time.
There are some evil things by the pool, and several Taoists are casting spells to suppress the evil spirit...
Event_FiveLoongDlc_Nurturance6:
The rocks here are arched and the water is turquoise.
A few thin willow orchid plants are planted along the pond, attracting birds to rest and hover from time to time.
Everyone held many gold and silver jewelry, silk and satin in their hands, looking at them in all their splendor and splendor...
Event_FiveLoongDlc_Nurturance7:
The rocks here are arched and the water is turquoise.
A few thin willow orchid plants are planted along the pond, attracting birds to rest and hover from time to time.
Several child servants, holding mirrors, knives and scissors, or copper basins, powder, and other things to modify their appearance, stood around the Jiao Pond...
Event_FiveLoongDlc_Nurturance8:
The rocks here are arched and the water is turquoise.
A few thin willow orchid plants are planted along the pond, attracting birds to rest and hover from time to time.
Several musicians were sitting around the Jiao Pond, playing joyful songs, dancing gracefully, getting up in time of excitement, and then stopping after enjoying themselves...
Event_FiveLoongDlc_Nurturance9:
The rocks here are arched and the water is turquoise.
A few thin willow orchid plants are planted along the pond, attracting birds to rest and hover from time to time.
Several scholars were drinking tea and talking by the pool. During the dinner, they were discussing the Four Books and Five Classics, or Taoism, human feelings, and the state of the world...

Event_ProfessionTravelingBuddhistMonkSki:
With the travels complete, the six dusts are thoroughly understood.
It is truly the great wisdom, a way of reaching paramita...
After achieving great success and reaching dharmadhatu, <Character key=RoleTaiwu str=Name/> felt their body become light and invigorated, fluttering in the breeze,
seeing tangible as intangible, observing the form as formless, their spirit leaving the sea of mind, penetrating the six realms of reincarnation and comprehending the karma of good and bad,
achieving wondeful merits...

Event_RighteousMan_Level0: "Punishing rape and eradicating evil, justice comes first..."
Event_RighteousMan_Level1: "I should patrol carefully and teach villains to not do whatever they want..."
Event_RighteousMan_Level2: "We will surely eradicate the evil spirits and become famous in the world..."
Event_RighteousMan_Level3: "I must always be on guard and not make the slightest mistake..."
Event_RighteousMan_Level4: "The way of escorting, martial arts, strategy, human relationships and rules are all indispensable..."
Event_RighteousMan_Level5: "Eradicate all the thieves in the world, only then can I be happy..."
Event_RighteousMan_Level6: "When it's over, brush off your clothes and hide your merit and fame..."
Event_RighteousMan_Level7: "The evil spirits and heretics can never be fully eradicated..."
Event_RighteousMan_Level8: "The right way is to benefit others and put others first..."
Event_SecretInformation_Admonish_CombatL: "Humph, defeated underling, when you have the ability to beat me, then it's not too late to teach me a lesson!"
"Heaven and earth, you have lost, I can't do what you say since..."
"Willing to bet to lose, since you can't beat me, there is no need to bother with words!"
"I am grateful for the... faith in words and actions, and I am sorry that I cannot listen to this matter..."
"Hee hee, why don't you take your defeat to advise me again and see if I can listen?"
Event_SecretInformation_Admonish_CombatW: "I can beat me to see that you have some skills, so I will listen to you once!"
"The things of the world are here and there, this time you have won, I should listen to what you say..."
"I have always been a promise, since you have beaten me squarely, I will listen to you!"
"This time I am happy and sincere, so I will do what you want..."
"Today is just a momentary oversight on my part, not a lack of skill, forced to listen to..."
Event_SecretInformation_Admonish_Entreat: "I am notoriously mean and ungrateful, do you really think I am a man of great affection and justice as you say?"
"You and I are not yet as high love and far-reaching, I can hardly obey..."
"I have always shown no favoritism, so why waste your breath!"
"Although you have a good intention, I am sorry I cannot accept..."
"If you cry on a cry, I may still be able to believe that you have a few sincere words..."
"You have always been obedient to me, today since you came to beg me, I will listen to you once!"
"Bitter words are good for the sick, and words of advice are good for the sick..."
"Although I do not show favoritism, but I am never a heartless and unrighteous generation, you are so earnest, I will listen to..."
"You are so hard-working and consider everything for me at all times... I will not let you down..."
"Rambling so much, it is headache... I listen to you is!"
Event_SecretInformation_Admonish_LifeSki: "How can there be so much truth in the world! What I do and what I say is the truth!"
"The things in the world, there are many different opinions, there is not this much right and wrong..."
"I have my own reasons for acting this way; if you can't convince me, then don't stop me!"
"Although you are wonderful words, yet reason is not better than words, how can I be convinced of it..."
"Distorting the truth and reversing black and white are clearly my skills, why did you steal them?"
"Your words today will be of some help to my plan!"
"Poor God knows the transformation, the warp and woof of heaven and earth, this natural way, is really the best..."
"You have a chapter in this outburst, a micro-word, I admire a million, I should listen to it!"
"The words of the sages, every word, my heart is pleased with them..."
"Where do you read this high-sounding talk from, it sounds harmonious!"
Event_SecretInformation_ThreatenFailed_E: "Hmph, seeking skin with a tiger, not measuring yourself..."
"This request is not in line with reason, forgive me for not being able to agree..."
Event_SecretInformation_ThreatenFailed_J: "I have a clear conscience, how can I be held hostage by you..."
Event_SecretInformation_ThreatenFailed_K: "I can't afford to make one mistake after another, so I'm sorry..."
Event_SecretInformation_ThreatenFailed_R: "Trying to get me to say yes based on this matter alone is a fool's errand..."
Event_SecretInformation_ThreatenSucceed_: "I will not dare to forget today's humiliation!"
"In that case, it's time to put an end to this matter..."
"Since this matter is my fault in the first place, it should be borne by me alone..."
"So be it... just hope not to implicate others..."
"So that's good? You are rather 'contented and happy'..."

Event_SectCombatMatch_CanNotLearnText: "I'm not good at this technique. Why don't you ask me for advice on another one..."

Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_1_1: The feathers of the Chicken can only be plucked once per chicken.
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_1_2: The feather of Chicken, when it is plucked for the first time.
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_1_3: You can only get one Chicken feather at a time.
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_1_4: You need to get the most beautiful one to be useful.
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_1_5: Once the most beautiful feather is obtained, it takes a long time to grow them again.
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_1_6: If you spend some time, you can get the most beautiful feathers.
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_1_7: Be careful on your journey. The King will come and go to deliver messages, so there's no need to worry...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_1_8: Be careful on your journey. You don't need to worry about my actions...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_1_9: The king will come and go of his own accord, so be careful and you won’t have to worry...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_2_1: The unknown villain is still hiding in the dark and has not yet appeared...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_2_2: We haven't found any trace of the unknown villain. Could it be that this person doesn't exist?
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_2_3: That unknown villain has not acted again so far, perhaps they have already given up...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_2_4: I heard that you have obtained the feather of the Chicken. This matter is indeed going very smoothly...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_2_5: You went to look for the Chicken feathers, and it seemed that no one had stopped you...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_2_6: Please quickly find the Chicken feathers, we must do it as soon as possible...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_2_7: It’s a pity that I’m in Fulong Altar now and can’t go with you...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_2_8: I've been thinking about it a lot lately, and I want to see this beautiful scenery again...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_2_9: It seems that there is a disciple of Fulong Altar who wants to travel around the world with you...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_3_1: Nothing happened in Fulong Altar. The villain may not be here anymore.
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_3_2: Nothing happened in Fulong Altar. The villain may be no longer alive.
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_3_3: Nowadays, I haven't seen anything strange. The only thing I worry about every day is eating too much...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_3_4: Nowadays, I haven't seen anything strange. The only thing I worry about every day is that i don't eat enough...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_3_5: I also heard the disciples of Fulong Altar say that they only wanted to save the people of the world and be kind-hearted...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_3_6: I also heard the disciples of Fulong Altar say that their only purpose was to spread the power of the real dragon to the people of the world...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_4_1: I heard that you have obtained half of the Chicken feathers.
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_4_2: I heard that you have obtained half of the demons' heads.
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_4_3: To celebrate the completion of the Colorful Feathered Dress, I ate more...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_4_4: To celebrate you killing demons, I ate more...
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_4_5: I wonder how are you doing now. Are you eating well?
Event_SectStoryFulong_ChickenKing_4_6: I wonder how are you doing now. Have you investigated the whereabouts of the criminal?
Event_SectStoryFulong_Lazuli_Friend_Foll:
"I see that the road of the martial arts world is full of unrest.
Only by mastering some martial arts skills can one travel the world unimpeded..."

"I wonder if there are any fresh wild fruits around here.
It would be nice if I could find some to quench my thirst..."

"I seem a little hungry, but I can still endure it...
How are you now? Do you want to rest for a while and eat some delicious food to fill your stomach?"

"I have followed you and have seen many things in the world.
Among mortals, sometimes they are friends, sometimes they are enemies, and the number of ways to assassinate someone is immeasurable.
No matter how much i think about it, i still remain puzzled..."
"The King has now returned to Taiwu Village, spending his days leisurely. I wonder how he is doing these days..."
Event_SectStoryFulong_Lazuli_Friend_Home:
"This Taiwu Village is very secluded, and it is really different from the noisy places outside...
It's been quite boring since I couldn't travel with you these days. When you come back this time, will you take me with you?"
Event_SectStoryFulong_Lazuli_Lover_Follo:
"This place has both mountains and water, and the scenery is pleasant.
If you have time, would you like to go with me to enjoy the scenery? Wander around for a while..."

"Demons appear frequently, and people with evil intentions also emerge in an endless stream...
Now I must not be as indiscriminate as I was before, and let you fall victim to their hidden harm!"

"You and I should have some good food and wine.
Once we are full and have plenty of energy, we can set off again...

But don't try to rush forward and miss the meal by mistake."

"I've been through so much traveling and so many trivial things...
Sigh... I don't know how long I will have to practice to be able to help you solve your problems..."

"Today I was admiring the scenery and quietly thinking, and I ate some nameless wild fruits...
They tasted ordinary, and the scenery was also ordinary.
But as i imagined you being by my side, they started to taste sweeter..."
Event_SectStoryFulong_Lazuli_Lover_Home:
"You finally came back to find me...
This time when we return to Taiwu Village, will you take me with you?
I will not cause any trouble for you, but I don't know what you think..."
Event_SectStoryJingang_ImpersonatorBuddh:
"When you talk about the world's illusions, you should give up the glitz...

Now I live in this Taiwu Village, I am not tired and there is nothing wrong with me.
The villagers have different personalities and interests, but...the most interesting person is naturally Taiwu..."

"Everything is in bubbles, and thoughts are like wild horses...

The people in Taiwu Village often tell me the story of Taiwu.
Some are mysterious and strange, some are earth-shattering, and some are romantic and anecdotes that are unknown whether they are true or false. I am always fascinated by them..."

"Living in this world is like an illusion, how can I enjoy it...

Everyone has something to do in the village.
There will no longer be those people who don’t know my origin, but worship me with incense and just make greedy wishes..."

"Everything in the world is subject to death, and there is no peace in the three realms...

Does Shi Zhu have anything strange to say recently?
If you want to use the Reincarnation Platform to perform the Soul Change Ceremony, I can help Shi Zhu at any time..."

"Although the heavens are happy, they will also lose their blessings when they are gone...
...
Why is Shi Zhu staring at me but saying nothing?"
Event_SectStoryKongsang_SelectAreaTip:
Are you sure you want to move Liao Family's Ancient Cauldron to {0}?
<color=#darkred>Once you confirm this, your life will be consumed!</color>
Event_SectStoryKongsong_LiaoWuming_Talk1:
"I have been investigating day and night for a long time, and it seems that a traitor from Kongsang passed by here,
It just so happened, let me try my strange poison..."
Event_SectStoryKongsong_LiaoWuming_Talk2:
"Uh... ah...
My heart and stomach are in unbearable pain right now, it's even worse than my flesh and blood being torn apart, my heart is torn apart. Give me the 'Life-Extending Secret Medicine',
I have to go back to the Kongsang School and take another dose...
If the poison is not enough, I will never give up..."
Liao Wuming's face was pale at this time, and he was gnashing his teeth, 
 Looking closely, there was also cold sweat oozing from his forehead, it must be really painful...
Event_SectStoryRanshan_HuajuLetter_Descr: The paper used for the yellow paper crane is fine in texture, bright in color, and very valuable. It must be a letter from Huaju.
The writing on the yellow paper crane is powerful and forceful, and can be seen through the back of the paper. It must be a letter from Huaju.
Event_SectStoryRanshan_XuanzhiLetter_Des: The writing on the blue paper crane is written by a sloppy hand, and there is a lingering smell of wine on the paper. It must be a letter from Xuanzhi.
The writing on the blue paper crane is unrestrained, and the strokes are as graceful as dragons and serpents. It must be a letter from Xuanzhi.
Event_SectStoryRanshan_YingjiaoLetter_De: There's a fragrance left on the pink paper crane, both faint and deep, sweet and intimate. It must be a letter from Yingjiao.
The writing on the pink paper crane is beautiful, with the ink used in just the right shades. It must be a letter from Yingjiao.

Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_1:
"Hmph, foreign emperors know how to enjoy themselves.
The mutton and soup here are so delicious, and the opera and puppets are also very good..."

Ran Xindu's eyebrows bent, and she said with a smile...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_10:
"Have we been here before? I wonder if the snowman is still there...
That mink is so cute, give it a poison and protect it from disaster."

Ran Xindu arched her eyebrows and said with a smile...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_11:
"Well, what kind of wine is this? It tastes sweet.
It’s just...why am I a little dizzy..."

Ran Xindu arched her eyebrows and said with a smile...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_12:
"The sky is big and the earth is big, I still like this fall the most,
However, I love being with you more, no matter where I am, I am happy..."

Ran Xindu arched her eyebrows and said with a smile...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_13:
"I heard that someone turned into a peacock and flew away. 
Is it possible that I have been infected by the picky poison..."

Ran Xindu’s eyebrows were curved, her eyes showing confusion...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_14:
"The lake here is beautiful, the rocks are beautiful, and the trees are beautiful.
The person is more beautiful, very..."

Ran Xindu arched her eyebrows and said with a smile...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_15:
"We in Miao territory don’t have such beautiful boats.
Hey, the lady on that boat is playing music, right? Wait for me to play the sheng and sing with them!"

Ran Xindu arched her eyebrows and said with a smile...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_2:
"What is this? It's numb and spicy!
Yeah! What is that? It looks black and white and weird. I wonder if I can catch it to refine the gu."

Ran Xindu's eyebrows bent, and she said with a smile...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_3:
"We have been here before. I wonder how old Qingniu and the young lady are doing now. Foreign ethnic groups live here. If you are drugged and taken back to get married, I don't care..."

Ran Xindu arched her eyebrows and said with a smile...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_4:
"There are a lot of Taoist temples here,
Why are there none dedicated to our Chiyou ancestors?
Well, this lacquerware is beautiful, um...the gongs and drums are so noisy!"

Ran Xindu arched her eyebrows and said with a smile...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_5:
"This person is generous and upright, is he a chivalrous person as you say?
But in my eyes, you are more chivalrous than them!"

Ran Xindu arched her eyebrows and said with a smile...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_6:
"Although these fallen flowers are beautiful,
but I still like the wild flowers in the Miao border more!"

Ran Xindu's eyebrows were arched and she said with a smile...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_7:
"I heard that there is Yue Lao not far away,
Humph... Of course I don't believe it, and I didn't ask for any red lines!"

Ran Xindu glared with her hands on her hips, but there was a smile in her eyes...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_8:
"Then Concubine Xiang's tears turned into Concubine Xiang bamboo...
Hum, if you are no longer here, I won’t shed tears... There is a way,
The Han people don't say that disasters will last for thousands of years. If you don't want to be a good person like Emperor Shun, you can just be a bad person!"

 Ran Xindu arched her eyebrows and said with a smile...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_0_9:
"The clan unity here is similar to that of our Miao people.
Well, I heard that when they get married here, they also have to watch their ancestors appear. That sounds interesting!"

Ran Xindu arched her eyebrows and said with a smile...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_1_1:
"It's hard to control the poison. I cast the poison, but I can't control what the poison does.
People always think they can control everything, the sacred land of Miao territory..."

Ran Xindu's eyebrows were curved, and there seemed to be sadness in her eyes, but her smile soon returned...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_1_2:
"Foreigners are the most cunning. If you lie to me,
I will poison you and turn you into a pig or a dog, and I won’t be reluctant to let you go..."

Ran Xindu stared with her hands on her hips, but there was a smile in her eyes...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_1_3:
"The land in Miao territory is so close to the sky.
I raised my hand to touch the sky and often talked to it, but it didn't answer me much...
Not only the grass and trees in Miao territory, but also all living creatures, no matter where they are, should be protected..."

Ran Xindu's eyebrows were curved, and there seemed to be sadness in her eyes, but her smile soon returned...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_1_4:
"We Miao people believe that one person is alive for life after life.
It will never change in my lifetime..."

Ran Xindu stared with her hands on her hips, but there was a smile in her eyes...
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_2_1:
"Do you know how to make golden silkworm Gu?
Let me tell you, you need to put twelve kinds of snakes and centipedes in a jar and bury them at the intersection.
Take it out after forty-nine days and put it in the incense burner!"
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_2_2:
"When you are infected by loach poison, it will feel like there are many loaches swimming around in your stomach. 
Sometimes it goes to your throat, sometimes it goes to your belly..."
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_2_3:
"Craziness Gu is made from bacterial poison. People will feel dizzy after eating it.
Laughing and cursing impermanence, as if seeing something that others cannot see..."
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_2_4:
"There is a kind of poison called love medicine. As long as it is eaten by others,
that person will fall in love with the person who cast the poison... Well, not just people.
I heard that a man accidentally fed this medicine to a sow, and the pig followed him closely, never leaving..."
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_2_5:
"There is a kind of flying Gu in the mountains. Its sound is like the chirping of a bird.
If you get this Gu, you will get dysentery, so I won’t talk to you anymore.
Well... there is a kind of rice field voodoo. If you are infected by this voodoo, soil will grow in your belly.
Rice awns will grow on the soil!"
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_3_1:
"There is a kind of medicine woman from the alien race. The poisonous people she cultivates will turn into beautiful men...
Hmph, don't let your imagination run wild, I won't tell you how to raise them!"
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_3_2:
"There is a secret technique in southern Xinjiang.
If you tattoo the name of your beloved on your body and tell your feelings to the tattoo every day,
Then your beloved will fall in love with you... Oh, why did I tell you?
You are not allowed to use it on others!"
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_3_3:
"In southern Xinjiang, clothes tied to trees are stained with diseases and pathogens.
You must not touch it..."
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_3_4:
"The Miao people have many more divination methods than foreigners, including copper coin divination, wooden stick divination, bamboo stick divination...
Wood stick hexagram, you take a wooden stick and beat it on the ground while asking the ancestors and ghosts.
Asked if the ghost stick moved, it means which ghost is causing trouble...
Hmph, I'm here, how dare ordinary ghosts come to you?"
Event_SectStoryWuxian_RanXinduFairy_3_5:
"There is a kind of witchcraft to break up marriages in southern Xinjiang.
Just carve a spell on the piece of wood and place it on the couple's grave.
They will be like thorns on their chests, looking at each other as if they were blocked by running water...
Of course I can do this..."
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_AdultDescript:
Looking intently, I saw Ji Xi now, with
frowning brows slightly, fair complexion, and graceful figure,
Looking like a slender lady, but with a bit of melancholy around her eyebrows...
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_BabyDescripti:
Looking carefully, I saw Ji Xi frowning.
With a fair complexion, small and thin body, 
clearly looking like a child, but a bit shrewd and mature...
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_Favorite1_1: "You have come to seek me now... What's the matter..."
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_Favorite1_2: "The sun is scorching, the mountains and rivers are overwhelming, but the tomb is more quiet..."
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_Favorite2_1: "Recently, you have been very busy investigating strange things in the village..."
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_Favorite2_2: "I am quite comfortable here, I am reluctant to leave..."
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_Favorite3_1: "You often go out late at night, remember to be careful..."
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_Favorite3_2:
"The bells of the past... woke me up...
The melodious sound of Longfeng, I still want to listen to it a few more times..."
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_Favorite4_1:
"There was heavy rain at night, if you get wet, 
remember to drink plenty of hot soup, don't catch the cold..."
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_Favorite4_2:
"The past is unforgettable... the good dreams are easy to go...
I tell you now, you probably don't understand, so..."
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_Favorite5_1:
"I only wander around in the village on weekdays...
I often meet the 'King' during the day, and occasionally walk up the mountain, but i haven't seen anything unusual..."
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_Favorite5_2:
"...
Hey...When did you appear...
I was just fascinated by this butterfly, you want to come with me...ah, it flew away..."
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_Favorite6_1:
"Why are staring at me like that... What's wrong...
My bun should not be messy, and there should be no dirt on my face, could it be..."
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_Favorite6_2:
"The husband's soul wants to return, so why return it in a moment... 
Do you know what this means... a bit of a strange tongue? Hmm..."
Event_SectStoryXuehou_Jixi_YoungDescript:
Looking intently, I saw Ji Xi now, with
frowning brows slightly, fair complexion, and slim figure,
exactly the appearance of a slender girl, but with a bit of sadness...

Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_1: If you don't understand anything, just ask me for advice!
Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_10: Here are some rude people reckless, good is boring... lucky is you came!
Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_11: You might as well admit defeat now, so as not to be embarrassed on stage...
Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_12: Hmph! Now you're here to ask for a fight?
Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_13: Do you insist on making an enemy of me?
Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_14: You might as well admit defeat to me now to avoid the pain of flesh and blood later...
Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_15: Now beg for mercy, later I may still be able to spare your life...
Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_2: Later on, you and I will do our best to fight fairly!
Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_3: I have nothing to say to you!
Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_4:
As long as you are safe and sound, 
 Who wins and who loses, for me are the same...
Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_5: It is better to be careful later...
Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_6: What do you want to do again?
Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_7:
You and I have a deep friendship, 
 No matter who wins afterwards, the other person is with the glory...
Event_TownCompetitionTalkDialog_8: Later you and I point to stop, do not hurt the peace...

GameVersionPoem_1_0_0:
Climbing the altar and worshiping the world, the golden list nominated proud of the group.

When autumn comes on the eighth day of the ninth month, a hundred flowers will be killed after my flower blooms.
InteractContentWithDoctor:
"Your eyes are black, your tongue is white, your face is colorless, and your mouth and nose are yellow.
I'm afraid you may be ill. Let me take a pulse for you first..."
InteractContentWithMerchant:
"When trading goods, the capital is small and the profits are meager. There is no bargaining, and no buying or selling on credit!"

<color=#lightgrey>(Merchants replenish their stocks at the start of each season...)</color>
InteractResponseToPraise_0: In the future, I will sharpen my skills to live up to your praise today...
InteractResponseToPraise_1: Thanks for your praise, I really can't afford it...
InteractResponseToPraise_2:
'Everyone has their strong and weak points',
Your distinguished self also has something deserving a praise...
InteractResponseToPraise_3:
Hey...
Even though those are just empty words, i still enjoyed hearing them!
InteractResponseToPraise_4:
What you said is true...
You are quite knowledgeable about people!
InteractTalkToBeautyMale: The rocks are like jade, the pines are like green

LK_BodyInjury_Tip_Content:
Each part of the character's body can receive up to <color=#pinkyellow>6</color> External injuries, and <color=#pinkyellow>6</color> Internal injuries. Injuries received outside of combat will be converted into Old Injury markers when entering combat;
When the amount of injuries on a body part reaches <color=#pinkyellow>2</color> or higher, <color=#brightred>the character's Health will be reduced by a certain amount every month</color>, and the more injuries there are, the more it will be reduced.
When the amount of injuries sustained by a body part reaches <color=#pinkyellow>5</color>, the cast time of skills that require the use of that body part <color=#brightred>will be doubled</color>.
When the amount of injuries sustained by a part reaches <color=#pinkyellow>6</color>, Martial Arts that require that body part to perform <color=#brightred>will become unusable.</color>
LK_Body_Part_Tips_Content:
Each part of the character's body can receive up to <color=#pinkyellow>6</color> External injuries, and <color=#pinkyellow>6</color> Internal injuries;
When the amount of injuries on a body part reaches <color=#pinkyellow>2</color> or higher, the character's Health will be reduced by a certain amount every month, and the more injuries there are, the more it will be reduced.
When the amount of injuries sustained by a  body part reaches <color=#pinkyellow>5</color>, the cast time of skills that require the use of that body part will be doubled.
When the amount of injuries sustained by a body part reaches <color=#pinkyellow>6</color>, Martial Arts that require that body part to perform <color=#darkred>will become unusable.</color>

LK_CombatSkillTree_OrganizationApprove_T:
<color=#B5DEDE>“门派支持”</color>代表<color=#F8E6C1>太吾</color>在该门派中的受支持程度…

<color=#B5DEDE>“门派支持”</color>来源于门派中的每一位成员，当达成门派成员的要求，就能够获得该门派成员的<color=#B5DEDE>“支持”</color>。
<color=#B5DEDE>“门派支持”</color>决定了能够从此门派中习得多么高深的功法。
当前<color=#B5DEDE>门派支持度上限</color>为<color=#F8E6C1>{0}</color>可以通过挑战<SpName=mousetip_qiyu_0><color=#FF5331>“剑冢”</color>来解锁<color=#B5DEDE>门派支持</color>的上限。</color>

<SpName=mousetip_lingxing><color=#F8E6C1>【额外支持上限】</color>
因为在<SpName=mousetip_qiyu_1><color=#93D853>“门派较武”</color>中获得了认可，<color=#F8E6C1>36</color><SpName=mousetip_shijie>月内该门派的<color=#B5DEDE>支持上限</color>额外<color=#B5DEDE>增加10%</color>。

LK_CombatSkill_SpecialBreak_Bubble_AddBo:
此法奥妙非常，老朽苦思不得，
小友若能再找些有用之物来，
或可有所进益……

多亏小友相助，
老朽方才悟得此招，
其中巧妙变化，这便与小友细细道来……

哼，就凭这些，怎能有所长进？
你若真有向学之心，
便快去多找些有用之物来……

果然不出本王所料！
指点你这招微末功夫，自是易如反掌……
LK_CombatSkill_SpecialBreak_Bubble_AddBr:
心无旁滞，顺其自然，
世间武学万变不离其间……
恭喜小友领悟关窍，习得新法……

你虽已领悟关窍，习得新法，
却要记得，世间武学繁杂冗余，
不可过分拘泥尺规法度……
LK_CombatSkill_SpecialBreak_Bubble_Idle_:
剑作刀形，鞭为棍势。
奇门化指，拳掌变幻。
此招该如何拆解？待老朽细思一二……

习武修道，应晓“变通”，
若能领悟真意，不拘形式，
虽不至无敌天下，亦可纵横江湖……
LK_CombatSkill_SpecialBreak_Bubble_Remov:
学过既忘，亦是自然之变，
老朽自小友忘却的招数中，
又得到了些心得体悟……

你这招忘得倒是甚好，
本王拆解其意，揣摩变化，
又从中得到了些心得体悟……

LK_Combat_Ai_Classic_Content:
为所有人物应用基础版的战斗AI…
<color=#yellow>在下一场战斗中生效…</color>
LK_Combat_Ai_Super_Content:
为所有人物应用升级版的战斗AI…
<color=#yellow>在下一场战斗中生效…</color>
LK_Combat_Ai_Try_Dodge_Tips: Automatically try to dodge enemy attacks during the Auto Move...
LK_Combat_Attack_Count_Tips: Performing weapon attacks requires attack tokens. Different weapons use different amount of attack tokens. The attack tokens recover on their own, and their recovery speed depends on Attack Speed stat...
LK_Combat_Attack_Value_Tip: The higher the weapon's External and Internal Penetration, the more damage it will deal
LK_Combat_Block_Attack_Tips:
以兵器招架兵器攻击，抵消受到的部分战败标记
每次招架结束，招架抵消的标记越多，再次发动招架的间隔便越久。
LK_Combat_Block_Attack_Tips1: When you are attacked by a weapon, and receive <color=#outterinjury>External Damage</color> or/and <color=#innerinjury>Internal Damage</color>, you will consume the corresponding Deflect value to resist the damage.
LK_Combat_Block_Attack_Tips2: When <color=#outterinjury>External Damage</color> or <color=#innerinjury>Internal Damage</color> Deflect gets depleted, character's Deflect will get broken.
LK_Combat_Block_Attack_Tips3: When Deflect gets broken, the character will immediately get hit by the enemy's <color=#outterinjury>「Decisive Strike」</color>.
LK_Combat_Block_Attack_Tips5: -<color=#brightblue>Causes a weapon attack with a maximum number of follow-up attacks, and is guaranteed to do critical hits</color>.
LK_Combat_Block_Attack_Tips6: -Based on the number of "<SpName=mousetip_gongshi>attack tokens" the weapon uses, it will <color=#brightblue>increase character's Accuracy by 150%, 300%, or 450% respectively</color>.
LK_Combat_Block_Broken_Fatal_Damage_Tips: When Deflecting, the defeat mark that the character successfully deflects will cause <color=#pinkyellow>Weak Point</color> to the person Deflecting when the Deflect is broken
LK_Combat_Block_Broken_Mind_Tips: When Deflecting, the defeat mark that the character successfully deflects will cause <color=#pinkyellow>Sealed Acupoint</color> to the person Deflecting when the Deflect is broken
LK_Combat_Block_Fatal_Damage_Tips:
在一轮招架中，最多可抵消的直接<color=#fataldamage>重创</color>标记的数量
倘若已无法再抵消直接<color=#fataldamage>重创</color>标记，招架将被打破
LK_Combat_Block_Inner_Injury_Tips:
在一轮招架中，最多可抵消的直接<color=#innerinjury>内伤</color>标记的数量
倘若已无法再抵消直接<color=#innerinjury>内伤</color>标记，招架将被打破
LK_Combat_Block_Mind_Tips:
在一轮招架中，最多可抵消的直接<color=#pinkyellow>失神</color>标记的数量
倘若已无法再抵消直接<color=#pinkyellow>失神</color>标记，招架将被打破
LK_Combat_Block_Outer_Injury_Tips:
在一轮招架中，最多可抵消的直接<color=#outterinjury>外伤</color>标记的数量
倘若已无法再抵消直接<color=#outterinjury>外伤</color>标记，招架将被打破
LK_Combat_Breath_Tips: Using internal Martial Arts requires Inhale. Your character will recover it over time, and the recovery speed depends on your Inhale Gather stat...
LK_Combat_CannotEscapeInfo: You can't escape from this battle...
LK_Combat_Carrier_Attack_Tips: Drive your mount to launch a single attack against the enemy.
LK_Combat_ChangeTrick_AcupointTips: When a Style Change attack causes damage to the enemy, enemy will receive a Sealed Acupoint of level matching the number of attack tokens used for the attack...
LK_Combat_ChangeTrick_FlawTips: When a Style Change attack causes damage to the enemy, enemy will receive a Weak Point of level matching the number of attack tokens used for the attack...
LK_Combat_Change_Trick_Tips: When attacking the enemy with a weapon, if the weapon can Style Change, it will accumulate progress and charges of Style Change; The max amount of Style Change charges held is 12...
LK_Combat_Click_Start_Tips: Click on the 'Space' button to start the battle

当敌我距离达到<color=#6DB75FFF>10</color>时，可尝试逃离此次战斗。

逃跑过程中，如果逃跑者在敌我距离被拉近至<color=#6DB75FFF>4</color>时被击中，逃跑将会被中断！

消耗<color=#6DB75FFF>1</color>次治疗伤势的机会，进行止血或调气以减轻运用者身上所有的外伤与内伤。

·疗伤需要耗费较多的时间。

匠人制造所得的装备、修理完毕的物品、拆解后获得的资源与引子会放置于此…

选择一只促织放置于蛰罐中。
放置于蛰罐中的促织会受到治疗。
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterDieLose_0: "What a brave cricket! Today I was really enlightened!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterDieLose_1: "It is not a good thing to let a grasshopper fight a cricket. It is better to avoid fighting with others in the future..."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterDieLose_2: "Life and death are unpredictable, victory and defeat are hard to predict, everything has a destiny..."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterDieLose_3: "Hmph! You think you're so great at bullying the weak? Sooner or later, I'll teach you a lesson!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterDieLose_4: "Couldn't be better. Now i don't have to keep such a useless thing in my hands!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterDieWin_0: "The fighting field is like a battlefield, so don't take it lightly!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterDieWin_1: "Although this was not my intention, it was caused by me. If only there was a way to save it..."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterDieWin_2: "Life and death are uncertain, please don't let this matter hurt the harmony between you and me..."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterDieWin_3: "Wow, why is your expression so unsightly? Could it be that you're feeling unwell?"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterDieWin_4: "Hmph, it is its own fault, you can't blame others."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterLose_0: "The cricket is indeed a brave creature, fearless in battle, and honorable even in defeat!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterLose_1: "Victory and defeat are unpredictable, as long as the insects are safe..."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterLose_2: "Victory is a joy, defeat is also a joy, don't take it too seriously..."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterLose_3: "Haha, it's really fun! It's much more interesting than fighting those bugs!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterLose_4: "It was only a momentary mistake. Let's see how long it can keep its cool!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterWin_0: "To move forward despite the difficulties is already a commendable courage!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterWin_1: "As long as our insects are safe, it doesn't matter who wins or loses..."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterWin_2: "Victory and defeat are common in the military, so don't worry too much about it..."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterWin_3: "My bugs haven't had enough fun fighting yet, hurry up and ask your bugs to come and compete again!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_AfterWin_4: "It's just a small insect that doesn't know its own limitations... but it looks just like its master."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_BeforeCombat_0: "I am sure to win this battle. Do you really want to fight?"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_BeforeCombat_1: "Are you really determined to fight? I don't want to hurt your cricket..."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_BeforeCombat_2: "The fate of this game is in my hands. If you insist on fighting, you will suffer heavy casualties..."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_BeforeCombat_3: "Haha! No matter how rare your cricket is, you'll just have to pick it up and feed it to the chickens later!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_BeforeCombat_4: "It's better to kowtow and admit defeat as soon as possible, so as to avoid being defeated too badly later!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_ForceGiveUp: "The winner is clear, why bother fighting?"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_ForceGiveUp_Refu: "The winner has not yet been decided, so stop talking!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_HalfFallen_0: "The outcome is still undecided, let's fight again!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_HalfFallen_1: "Good bug! Do what you can. If you can't do it, retreat. Don't get hurt..."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_HalfFallen_2: "There is still room for improvement in this situation. It is still unknown who will win..."
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_HalfFallen_3: "Hurry up and teach that stink bug a lesson, or else I'll really treat you as a bottle gourd!"
LK_CricketCombat_Bubble_HalfFallen_4: "If you succeed, you will be a king. If you fail, you will be a bandit. Why don't you rise up and fight again!"
LK_Cricket_Escaped_Tips: There is a loss there is a gain, do not be sad

LK_Developing_TipsContent:
目前游戏为开发中版本，十分缺乏游玩引导，
由此给您造成的不良体验，我们深表歉意，
我们会在游戏推出完整版时，尽最大努力完善游戏引导与游戏内百科，
您在游玩过程中遇到任何问题，都请务必反馈给我们，
游戏开发不易，感谢您对我们的持续关注与支持…

LK_EventEditor_DownloadExampleNotice:
通过查看“使用文档”，可以更好的帮助您使用事件编辑器

点击“<color=#darkcyan><u><link="Document">这里</link></u></color>”，可以查看事件编辑器的使用文档，使用文档中有事件编辑器的使用方法

点击“<color=#darkcyan><u><link="Example">这里</link></u></color>”，可以查看一组示例事件，以实例帮助您进一步了解一个事件的制作方法



<color=#lightgrey>（当您选择或创建了自己的事件，该信息将不再显示，您可以在事件编辑器的<color=#darkcyan><u><link="FAQ">"问答库"</link></u></color>找到使用文档和示例事件，如对事件编辑器有任何疑问或建议，欢迎您通过游戏启动器的“支持”，把您的疑问和建议反馈给我们，感激不尽！）</color>

LK_EventEditor_Publish_Steps:
恭喜，当前Mod事件库已经准备完成！你可以按照这样的流程发布你的Mod：
1、在自动打开的Config.lua文件中，填写你的Mod的名字到Title字段的值中，填写你的Mod描述到Description字段的值中。(如果你在文件中看到FileId字段，千万不要修改这个字段的值！)  
2、Ctrl+S保存Config.lua。
3、制作自己的Mod封面，把Mod封面的贴图拷贝到自动打开的Publish,并改名为Cover.png。
4、返回主界面，点击模组选择->上传，在待上传模组文件夹路径处输入刚才自动打开的Publish文件夹路径。
5、选择模组可见性，填写更新简述，点击确定上传

LK_ExtraProfessionSkill_Desc: In times of chaos, everyone relies on their skills to survive in the world. Beggars mingle in the streets, nobles play with the world's affairs... Witnessing all things in the world, experiencing human relationships and emotions, gradually understanding the true meaning of aspirations, becoming experts in their fields, and gaining endless benefits from these unique experiences...

LK_ExtraProfessionSkill_UnlockDesc:
“红尘风霜，炼人心境，不阅世情，终难悟道。”

{0}以{1}身，行江湖路，
历经红尘风霜，遍览俗世人情，如此经年累月，已然志向有成，
而今{2}思及往事，一时有所感怀，不觉间竟然识性悟道……

<color=#brightblue>({3}识性悟道，已获得志向有成特性，
今后若然另生感悟，亦将重有所获……）</color>

LK_Feature_Attack_Desc:
「进攻」策略越高，人物越可能获得「出战」、「催发」、「攻击」、「掠阵」助战指令…
若无「进攻」策略，减少一个助战指令。
LK_Feature_Defence_Desc:
「守御」策略越高，人物越可能获得「防御」、「还护」、「解穴」、「警示」助战指令…
若无「守御」策略，减少一个助战指令。
LK_Feature_Wisdom_Desc:
「机略」策略越高，人物越可能获得「迅进」、「拉回」、「疗伤」、「驱毒」、「真气」助战指令…
若无「机略」策略，减少一个助战指令。
「机略」的高低决定着战斗、较艺的先手后情况…
「机略」越高，人物在战斗中就能使用越多的物品…
机略越高，人物在较艺开始时就能探明越多较艺的主题…

LK_Following_Count_Tips_Content: Opening Stations in non-corrupted areas will increase the maximum number of character you can follow...
LK_Following_Entry_Tips_Content: You can see current status of followed characters in this menu...
LK_Following_NickName_Tips_Content:
<color=#lightgrey>昵称是对此人专属的爱称，以替代其在各处的称呼…</color>

<color=#pinkyellow>·昵称将会替代人物原本姓名的显示…</color>
<color=#pinkyellow>·昵称不会改变人物的真实名称…</color>
<color=#pinkyellow>·取消关注后将会取消此人物的昵称…</color>
LK_Following_Tips_Content: By following a character, you can more easily see their whereabouts in the Following menu...
LK_Following_Tips_Content_Disable: <color=#brightred>The number of currently followed characters reached limit...</color>
LK_FoodStorageMaterial_Tip:
厨仓的烹饪空间…
可放入食材类引子，月份更替时农户们将会用其进行烹饪…
LK_FoodStorageWarehouse_Tip:
厨仓的存储空间…
可放入资源<SpName=mousetip_ziyuan_0>食材，以及烹饪工具，月份更替时农户们将会用其烹饪…
烹饪完毕的食物会放置于此…
LK_FullScreenTipDesc: Switch display mode to windowed or full-screen...
LK_FuyuMousetip_Desc_0: The hilt has a simple shape and a texture that is neither gold nor iron. Because there are two characters engraved in seal script on both sides of the sword hilt,
LK_FuyuMousetip_Desc_1: The two words, hence the name, were on the hilt of the sword, and the blade was nowhere to be found.
LK_Fuyu_Sowrd_Use_Tips: Using the FuYu Hilt on a severely wounded Possessed person in battle to have a certain chance of restoring his sanity and relieving him of his Possessed state...
LK_GearMateAttribute_SpeakWord0: Your kindness is like rain and dew that nourishes all things, my gratitude is endless...
LK_GearMateAttribute_SpeakWord1: Discuss and ponder, and endlessly hone oneself...
LK_GearMateAttribute_SpeakWord2: Scrutinize and revise your skills, to perfect what's already outstanding...
LK_GearMateBreak_Button_Tips_Normal: Make <color=#orange>{0}</color> imitate the breakthrough effect of the technique...
LK_GearMateBreak_Button_Tips_NotBreak: Requires techniques that have been broken through...
LK_GearMateBreak_Button_Tips_NotLearned: Requires <color=#orange>{0}</color> to have studied the corresponding pages...
LK_GearMateBreak_Scroll_Tips_Broken: <color=#orange>{0}</color> already imitated the breakthrough effect of this technique...
LK_GearMateBreak_Scroll_Tips_NotLearned: <color=#orange>{0}</color> still hasn't studied the corresponding page...
LK_GearMateBreak_SpeekWord0:
关窍既解，新法始成…
得传此法，定当时时铭记，不负所托
LK_GearMateBreak_SpeekWord1:
练功习武，本无定式…
武道无穷，不可囿于成法…
革故鼎新，以应万变…
LK_GearMateCombatSkill_SpeakWord0: This technique has so many variations, it makes me gasp with amazement...
LK_GearMateCombatSkill_SpeakWord1: Amazing, this world contains such an enlightening technique...
LK_GearMateCombatSkill_SpeakWord2: Receiving this masterpiece, my martial arts skills will undoubtedly be improved...
LK_GearMateCombatSkill_SpeakWord3: The path of martial arts is endless, and one must not slack off even for a single day...
LK_GearMateConsummate_SpeakWord0: Dedicate yourself to progress, and improve day by day...
LK_GearMateConsummate_SpeakWord1: Don't settle on existing achievements, and strive for more...
LK_GearMateConsummate_SpeakWord2: Be kind and helpful, and you will be repaid with benevolence...
LK_GearMateFeature_SpeakWord0: Piling up dirt eventually creates a mountain, little drops of water make an ocean...
LK_GearMateFeature_SpeakWord1: Even if you're talentless, you can achieve success by working hard...
LK_GearMateFeature_SpeakWord2: Strive for self-improvement, and adapt to the times...
LK_GearMateLifeSkill_SpeakWord0: This book is very profound and detailed, it opened my eyes to the world...
LK_GearMateLifeSkill_SpeakWord1: Seeing this book, i am now aware of the wisdom of our ancestors...
LK_GearMateLifeSkill_SpeakWord2: Receiving this masterpiece, most of my doubts have been dispelled...
LK_GearMateLifeSkill_SpeakWord3: Sea of learning has no horizon, opening a book is always beneficial...
LK_GearMateNeiliAllocationBtnTip0: Taiwu has no Circulation True Qi to transmit...
LK_GearMateNeiliAllocationBtnTip1: Mechanical Puppet's Circulation True Qi has already reached the limit...
LK_GearMateNeiliAllocationBtnTip2: Taiwu's Circulation True Qi hasn't been selected yet...
LK_GearMateNeili_SpeakWord0: Chiseled jade creates an orifice, reflecting the four joint points...
LK_GearMateNeili_SpeakWord1: Hidden strings acting as veins, regulating deficiency and excess...
LK_GearMateNeili_SpeakWord2: Water and fire interact, allowing numerous machines to draw energy...
LK_GearMateUpgradePageLabel_3: Taiwu is unable to take back the transferred Circulation True Qi!

存在待传输的真气，

是否确认退出？

在全选时这些物品不会被选中。
LK_GearMate_NeiliAllocationConfirm: Once Taiwu's Circulation True Qi is transferred, it will not be able to be withdrawn! Are you sure you want to transfer it?
LK_Generic_Grid_Desc:
万用格代表着当前主运内功的灵活程度…

<color=#yellow>（通过将万用格分配给任意类型的功法装备栏，能够使其运转更多相应类型的功法。）</color>
LK_Generic_Grid_Unlock_Tips: When practice proportion of the InA reach this level, you will gain the univsersal slots here
LK_Gold_Thread_Desc: The Golden Thread can only subdue Divine Dragons and cannot capture other creatures!
LK_Goodness_Desc_0:
刚正不阿之侠者，处世黑白分明。
除恶则必尽，树德则必滋。世事纵有千变万化，正道总是仅此一条！
LK_Goodness_Desc_1:
慈悲仁善者，品行殊高洁。
扶危能够舍己，济世能够忘我。可以报怨以德，宛然浑金璞玉一般。
LK_Goodness_Desc_2:
中庸无为者，处世不偏不倚。
凡事顺其自然，但求折中调和。心中既少了正邪之分，或许终能成就开明大道？
LK_Goodness_Desc_3:
叛逆处世者，直性狭中、黑白颠倒。
“应笑”而不笑、“应喜”而不喜、“应慈”而不慈、“闻恶”而不改、“闻善”而不乐。
LK_Goodness_Desc_4:
世间唯我者，凌弱者，伐异己，党邪佞，欺良善。
为达目的不择手段，唯利是图无情无义。
LK_Goodness_Desc_Color_0:
You are a <color=#BehaviorType_Just>Just</color> warrior for whom there's only black or white, right or wrong.
The evil must be punished, and morality shall be encouraged, that's the only way of being human!
LK_Goodness_Desc_Color_1:
Those who are <color=#BehaviorType_Kind>Kind</color> are compassionate, and possess exceptionally virtuous character.
They can sacrifice themselves to help those in need, and repay resentment with kindness, resembling unpolished jade and pure gold.
LK_Goodness_Desc_Color_2:
You are <color=#BehaviorType_Even>Even</color>, moderate, and unbiased.
You go with the flow, but prefer balance and harmony. Since there's no right or wrong in your heart, perhaps you could achieve enlightenment?
LK_Goodness_Desc_Color_3:
You are <color=#BehaviorType_Rebel>Rebel</color>, straightforward, intolerant, and distort facts.
You have opposite views and practices than most people.
LK_Goodness_Desc_Color_4:
You are <color=#BehaviorType_Egoistic>Egoist</color>.
Bullying the weak, colluding with villains, and deceiving kind people. Nothing matters to you except for your goals.

每3<SpName=mousetip_shijie>可进行1次安抚…
LK_JiaoPool_BreedingTips_Desc:
已育成且尚未参与过繁育的长蛟，可以与另一只符合条件的异性长蛟进行繁育。
同池三个月后将会诞下一枚继承了父母一定属性与颜色的蛟卵

<color=#pinkyellow>繁育期间可随时停止繁育…</color>
LK_JiaoPool_ChangeLonng_DisableTips2: There are no more chances for transformation, it's impossible to continue to transform...

是否舍弃当前化形结果？
<color=#grey>（已消耗的龙鳞将不会返还）</color>
LK_JiaoPool_ChangeLonng_StartChangeConfi: Are you sure you want to consume Dragon Scales to transform?
LK_JiaoPool_ChangeNameBtnTips_Desc: Give a Jiao a unique nickname. Before it turns into a Dragon Son, you can change its nickname at any time in the Jiao Pond...
LK_JiaoPool_EntrustedParentingTips:
当前正在将此蛟池交由豢龙氏兄妹管理，此蛟池中出现的随机养育事件将<color=#orange>不会通知太吾</color>…

可点击此按钮亲手管理此蛟池，此蛟池中出现的随机养育事件将<color=#orange>以待办事件的形式通知太吾</color>，由太吾进行抉择…
LK_JiaoPool_Hualong_Confirm: After turning into a Dragon Son, it will no longer be the Jiao of the past. There is no way to change this matter, so you need to act with caution...
LK_JiaoPool_Hualong_PopUpTitle: It is not easy for a Jiao to transform into a Dragon. If it's destined, maybe it could transform into a Dragon Son...
LK_JiaoPool_HualoongTips_Desc: If through rearing and breeding one attribute of a growing Jiao reaches <SpName=mousetip_jiao_max><color=#brightblue>Pinnacle</color>, and two attributes reach <SpName=mousetip_jiao_excellent><color=#yellow>Outstanding</color>, then it becomes possible to use Dragon Scales to transform it into a Dragon Son...
LK_JiaoPool_JiaoLeavePoolBtnTips_Desc:
令长蛟暂时离开蛟池。
离开蛟池的长蛟会保留当前的属性、成长进度与养育方针，</color>

<color=#pinkyellow>重新放入蛟池后，会以原有的状态继续养育…</color>
LK_JiaoPool_JiaoLeavePoolBtnTips_Desc_2: Orders growing Jiao to leave the Jiao Pond temporarily.
LK_JiaoPool_NoAvailable_Jiao: <color=#brightred>Requirements to grow the Jiao haven't been met yet...</color>
LK_JiaoPool_NurtureExpendTips_Desc_0:
养育期间，每月根据养育方针将会消耗一定的资源…
月份更替时，按蛟池从左到右，从上到下的顺序进行资源消耗。
LK_JiaoPool_NurtureExpendTips_Desc_1:
如果满足资源需求，<color=#brightblue>便会增加养成进度。</color>
如果资源不足，<color=#brightred>则本月不会增长养成进度。</color>
LK_JiaoPool_NurtureExpendTips_Desc_2: <color=#darkred>When the Taming Level is low, the growing Jiao will have a chance of escaping from the Jiao Pond...</color>
LK_JiaoPool_NurturePlanTips_Desc_3: Growing Jiao's Rearing Plan can be changed at any time, but if you modify it during the rearing period, <color=#brightred>it will reset all current development progress and attribute growth...</color>
LK_JiaoPool_NurturePlanTips_Desc_General:
· 当前养育方针：<color=#pinkyellow>{0}</color>
· 养成属性：{1}<color=#pinkyellow>{2}</color>

Growing Jiao's Rearing Plan can be changed at any time, but if you modify it during the rearing period, <color=#brightred>it will reset all current development progress and attribute growth...</color>
LK_JiaoPool_ParentingTips:
当前正在亲手管理此蛟池，此蛟池中出现的随机养育事件将<color=#orange>以待办事件的形式通知太吾</color>，由太吾进行抉择…

可点击此按钮将此蛟池交由豢龙氏兄妹管理，太吾便<color=#orange>不会再收到此蛟池的随机养育待办事件</color>…
LK_JiaoPool_StopBreedingTips_Desc: Make the breeding target of reared Jiao leave the current Jiao Pond and stop the breeding behavior...
LK_JiaoPool_Taiwu_NotInVillage: <color=#brightred>Transformation into a Dragon Son requires Taiwu to personally visit the Jiao Pond. Without Taiwu to watch over, it's almost impossible to succeed...</color>
LK_JiaoPool_TakeBackEggTips_Desc:
取回蛟池中的蛟卵。
取回蛟卵会导致孵化中断，<color=#brightred>清除现有的孵化进度…</color>

<color=#yellow>即使失去此奇书，此效果仍会继续生效…</color>
LK_LegendaryBook_Break_Plate_Unlock_Cont:
确定挑战奇书中潜藏的心魔，
以解锁此类功法的突破结果栏位吗？

<color=#yellow>突破结果栏位可用于保存各个功法的不同突破结果。</color>
 需要消耗：
LK_LegendaryBook_Fallen_Desc_1: Owner of the Legendary Manual is Possessed, gaining extra Traits:
LK_LegendaryBook_Fallen_Desc_2: Owner of the Legendary Manual lost their mind, gaining extra Traits:
LK_LegendaryBook_GiveUp_NotchButton_2: To the best of your abilities
LK_LegendaryBook_GiveUp_Start_Huaju: This kid is so obsessed with this Legendary Manual. I, Huaju, should give them a wake-up call!
LK_LegendaryBook_GiveUp_Start_Xuanzhi: That makes sense. I will go and rescue this person from the boredom of studying a weird book like a shut-in...
LK_LegendaryBook_GiveUp_Start_Yingjiao: No matter how good the book is, there are people in the world who are better than it. Master, if you don't believe me, I will prove it to you...
LK_LegendaryBook_GiveUp_Stop_Huaju: Since Taiwu heir arranged it like this, there must be deep meaning behind it...
LK_LegendaryBook_GiveUp_Stop_Xuanzhi: Taiwu, you came just in time! If I stayed here any longer, i would've became a bookworm!
LK_LegendaryBook_GiveUp_Stop_Yingjiao: If Master has any other arrangements, please let me know...
LK_LegendaryBook_GiveUp_Tips_Corpse1: Huaju: <color=#pinkyellow>Good at enticing others with wealth, testing their <SpName=mousetip_zhuyao_0>Strength and <SpName=mousetip_zhuyao_3>Constitution;</color>
LK_LegendaryBook_GiveUp_Tips_Corpse2: Xuanzhi: <color=#pinkyellow>Good at enticing others with comfort, testing their <SpName=mousetip_zhuyao_1>Agility and <SpName=mousetip_zhuyao_5>Comprehension;</color>
LK_LegendaryBook_GiveUp_Tips_Corpse3: Yingjiao: <color=#pinkyellow>Good at enticing others with desire, testing their <SpName=mousetip_zhuyao_2>Willpower and <SpName=mousetip_zhuyao_4>Vitality.</color>
LK_LegendaryBook_GiveUp_Tips_Desc1: <color=#grey>Send the Three Corpses to follow the holder of the Legendary Manual, and guide them to give up the Legendary Manual...</color>
LK_LegendaryBook_GiveUp_Tips_Desc2: <color=#brightblue>Every 3 months, Three Corpses will follow the holder of the Legendary Manual and take an action...</color>
LK_LegendaryBook_GiveUp_Tips_Desc3: <color=#brightblue>Each action of the Three Corpses will change the Mood of the other party according to their current Mood changes. The more extreme their Mood is, the more likely they will get guided by the Three Corpses and give up the Legendary Manual...</color>
LK_LegendaryBook_Keeping_LoadBook_Huaju: This is what Taiwu heir has left behind...
LK_LegendaryBook_Keeping_LoadBook_Xuanzh: I'm not gonna lie, i sneakily read through this book a couple of times before, but i didn't understand anything in it...
LK_LegendaryBook_Keeping_LoadBook_Yingji: Master, do you have something important you want to entrust me?
LK_LegendaryBook_Keeping_SaveBook_Huaju: Huaju will definitely live up to your expectations.
LK_LegendaryBook_Keeping_SaveBook_Xuanzh: Leave this matter to me, and I'll guarantee its absolute safety!

After <color=#ffffff>Combat</color> and <color=#ffffff>Debates</color>, there's a chance to trigger Combat Circulation and Heavenly Resonance...

Combat Circulation: <color=#brightblue>Immediately completes a Cultivation cycle...</color>
Heavenly Resonance: <color=#brightred>Consume certain amounts of Willpower</color>, <color=#brightblue>in order to use different Circulation Methods to provide various additional benefits for Cultivation...</color>

随着周天真气的增加，获取周天真气所需要的修炼经验也会随之提高…

LK_Main_SummaryInfo_Behavior_TipContent:
处世立场代表人物最根本的处世态度和观念…

<color=#pinkyellow>·立场差别越大的两个人，越难相处
·不同的立场能够发起的行为不尽相同
·不同的立场在许多事件中获得的结果不尽相同

<SpName=mousetip_lichang_4><color=#BehaviorType_Egoistic>唯我</color>
<SpName=mousetip_lichang_3><color=#BehaviorType_Rebel>叛逆</color>
<SpName=mousetip_lichang_2><color=#BehaviorType_Even>中庸</color>
<SpName=mousetip_lichang_1><color=#BehaviorType_Kind>仁善</color>
<SpName=mousetip_lichang_0><color=#BehaviorType_Just>刚正</color></color>
LK_Main_SummaryInfo_Char_Name_TipContent:
人物的姓名…

<color=#pinkyellow>·某些情况下，人物的姓名可能并非其真名</color>
LK_Main_SummaryInfo_Fame_TipContent:
名誉代表世人对人物的看法，与人物的善恶无关。

<color=#pinkyellow>·名誉的高低会影响他人对人物的好感
·名誉低至「<color=#FameType_Worse>千夫所指</color>」时，会遭遇侠士们的袭击
·名誉从低到高：

<SpName=mousetip_mingyu_0><color=#FameType_Worst>妖魔鬼怪</color>
<SpName=mousetip_mingyu_1><color=#FameType_Worse>千夫所指</color>
<SpName=mousetip_mingyu_2><color=#FameType_Bad>名声败坏</color>
<SpName=mousetip_mingyu_3><color=#FameType_Normal>默默无闻</color>
<SpName=mousetip_mingyu_4><color=#FameType_Good>立身扬名</color>
<SpName=mousetip_mingyu_5><color=#FameType_Better>声驰千里</color>
<SpName=mousetip_mingyu_6><color=#FameType_Best>誉满天下</color></color>
LK_Main_SummaryInfo_Gender_TipContent:
人物的性别…

<color=#pinkyellow>·某些情况下，人物的样貌可能与其性别并不完全相符

<SpName=mousetip_xingie_0>男
<SpName=mousetip_xingie_1>女</color>
LK_Main_SummaryInfo_Happiness_TipContent:
人物的心情…

<color=#pinkyellow>·导致人物心情变化的原因很多
·若心情处于沮丧及以下，人物的心魔每月都会得到些许滋养
·人物的心情从低到高：

<SpName=mousetip_xinqing_0><color=#HappinessType_Saddest>悲极</color>
<SpName=mousetip_xinqing_1><color=#HappinessType_Painful>痛苦</color>
<SpName=mousetip_xinqing_2><color=#HappinessType_Depressed>沮丧</color>
<SpName=mousetip_xinqing_3><color=#HappinessType_Normal>寻常</color>
<SpName=mousetip_xinqing_4><color=#HappinessType_Pleased>开怀</color>
<SpName=mousetip_xinqing_5><color=#HappinessType_Delighted>欢喜</color>
<SpName=mousetip_xinqing_6><color=#HappinessType_Happiest>乐极</color></color>
LK_Main_SummaryInfo_Identity_TipContent:
人物在所属城镇或门派中的身份或地位…

<color=#pinkyellow>·身份或地位越高的人物，越难结交
·身份或地位共有从低到高九个级别：
<color=#GradeColor_0>灰</color>、<color=#GradeColor_1>白</color>、<color=#GradeColor_2>绿</color>、<color=#GradeColor_3>蓝</color>、<color=#GradeColor_4>青</color>、<color=#GradeColor_5>紫</color>、<color=#GradeColor_6>黄</color>、<color=#GradeColor_7>橙</color>、<color=#GradeColor_8>红</color></color>

·<color=#brightblue>每次月份更替根据身份可获得一定的身份贡献值</color>
·<color=#darkred>上月身份贡献值会在月份更替后清空</color>

人物从库房取用资源或物品会消耗<SpName=mousetip_contribution_0>贡献值
人物赠予库房资源或物品可获得<SpName=mousetip_contribution_0>贡献值
<SpName=mousetip_contribution_0>贡献值会在<SpName=mousetip_settlementinformation_0>势力值变化时清空并转化为<SpName=mousetip_settlementinformation_0>势力值增长

·<SpName=mousetip_publicwarehouse>Items that are going to be taken from the Public Storage：

LK_MakeWugKing_List_Tip_1: ·Gu King is considered to be a type of poison, which can be eaten directly, thrown in battle, or consumed as a boost for <SpName=mousetip_wugking>「Gu Finger Techniques」
LK_MakeWugKing_List_Tip_2: ·Only one Gu King can exist in a host at the same time. The Gu King implanted later will replace the previously implanted Gu King. This action is not considered as a natural death for a Gu King.
LK_MakeWugKing_List_Tip_3: ·Gu King cannot be affected by poisons, and will only die naturally at the end of its duration;
LK_MakeWugKing_List_Tip_4: ·When a Gu King dies naturally, it will cause damage to the host's traits.
LK_MakeWugKing_Make_NotPut: No poison has been put in yet...
LK_MakeWugKing_PreviewTip_Content_1: ·The proportion of poisons consumed when refining a Gu King is consistent with the proportion of poisons put in the Myriad Gu Altar...
LK_MakeWugKing_PreviewTip_Content_2: ·When the proportion of poisons consumed by refining matches a specific Gu King, or the poisons are balanced, a specific Gu King will be refined; In other cases, a random Gu King will be refined...
LK_MakeWugKing_PreviewTip_Content_3: ·<color=#brightred>Refining Gu King will cause the amount of Poison consumed in the next refining to become 200% of the base cost</color>. The additional cost will be reduced by 50% every month, until it returns to 100%…

可放入资源<SpName=mousetip_ziyuan_5>药材，以及制药工具、毒药与解药，月份更替时大夫们将会用其制药、解毒、淬毒…

商队抵达终点后，太吾可获得的收益与太吾投资金额的比例…
在商队途径<SpName=mousetip_development_1><color=#pinkyellow>文化</color>较高的定居点时，<color=#brightblue>收益比例会获得提升</color>…

商队等级越高，太吾投资该商队所需的<SpName=mousetip_ziyuan_6><color=#pinkyellow>银钱</color>便越多…

LK_MerchantInfo_Protect_Tip_Desc: Taiwu can spend Prestige to deter bandits along Caravan's way, <color=#brightblue>halving the chance of the caravan being robbed on the way</color>...
LK_MerchantInfo_Protect_Tip_NotCooldown: Taiwu has already Protected a Caravan this month...
LK_MerchantInfo_Protect_Tip_NotNeed: This Caravan has a 0% chance of being robbed, there's no need in protection...
LK_MerchantInfo_RemainPath_Tip:
商队此次行程还需经过的定居点数量…
商队每抵达一个定居点时，若该地区<SpName=mousetip_development_1><color=#pinkyellow>文化</color>低，则商队的<color=#brightblue>意外收益概率上升</color>；若该地区<SpName=mousetip_development_1><color=#pinkyellow>文化</color>高，则商队的<color=#brightblue>收益比例上升</color>；若该地区<SpName=mousetip_development_0><color=#pinkyellow>安定</color>低，则商队的<color=#brightred>遇劫几率上升</color>；若该地区<SpName=mousetip_development_0><color=#pinkyellow>安定</color>高，则商队的<color=#brightblue>遇劫几率下降</color>…
LK_MerchantInfo_RobbedRate_Tip:
此次行程中，商队遇到劫匪的概率…
每当月份更替、商队进行移动时，均有可能在途中遇到拦路劫匪，若商队未能抵御打劫，则此次行程的<color=#brightred>收益比例将会下降</color>…
太吾每月可进行一次<color=#pinkyellow>「威慑保护」</color>，令一支商队的<color=#brightblue>遇劫几率下降</color>；若太吾路遇遭到打劫的商队，亦可主动出手，帮助商队击退劫匪…
LK_MerchantInfo_TargetLocation_Tip:
商队此次行程的最终目的地…
到达此地后，商队将完成货品销售，<color=#brightblue>为商会带来收益</color>；
若此次行程，太吾已经投资过该商队，则到达终点的商队也会<color=#brightblue>为太吾带来收益</color>…

LK_Mod_SetLegacy_Tip_Content:
归档 Mod 当前使用的 Dll 并<color=#orange>清空列表中所有已设置的 Dll</color>，自动生成相关的引用提供给正式分支，<color=#orange>归档后需重新设置 Mod 所引用的 Dll……</color>

可用于维护在测试分支已失效的 Mod，同时保留对正式分支的兼容性。
使用方式为，在测试分支发现自己 Mod 失效后，备份当前版本，在列表清空后重新设置已维护的 Dll 文件，保存上传后就可以实现双分支兼容性。
<color=#orange>务必确保点击备份时列表中是正式分支可用的 Dll 版本。</color>

<color=#lightgrey>该功能仅推荐在测试分支使用</color>

LK_Mod_k_EResultAccountAssociatedToMulti: 当前帐户已与多个合作伙伴相关联。
LK_Mod_k_EResultAccountLockedDown: 当前用户帐户目前被锁定，无法使用。 通常是因为帐户劫持和待处理的所有权验证。
LK_Mod_k_EResultAccountLoginDeniedThrott: 尝试登录失败，尝试阻止对可能的攻击者响应。
LK_Mod_k_EResultAccountLogonDenied: 由于第二步验证失败，帐户登录被拒绝。
LK_Mod_k_EResultAccountLogonDeniedNoMail: 由于第二步验证失败，帐户登录被拒，且未发送邮件。
LK_Mod_k_EResultAccountLogonDeniedVerifi: 由于帐户电子邮件未能验证，登录失败。
LK_Mod_k_EResultAccountNotFeatured: 帐户未充值，此功能不可用。
LK_Mod_k_EResultAdministratorOK: 只有在管理员发出请求时才允许采用此操作。
LK_Mod_k_EResultAlreadyLoggedInElsewhere: 用户在别处登录。 （应换用 k_EResultLoggedInElsewhere！）
LK_Mod_k_EResultAlreadyOwned: 用户已拥有此玩家通行证兑换请求中的所有游戏。
LK_Mod_k_EResultAlreadyRedeemed: 玩家通行证已被帐户兑换，不能再次使用。
LK_Mod_k_EResultBadResponse: 由于分析失败、字段遗失等导致错误响应。
LK_Mod_k_EResultBanned: 用户受到 VAC 封禁。
LK_Mod_k_EResultBusy: 调用的方法繁忙，未进行操作。
LK_Mod_k_EResultCancelled: 操作被取消，通常是被用户取消。 （如 内容下载。)
LK_Mod_k_EResultCannotUseOldPassword: 请求的新密码不受认可。
LK_Mod_k_EResultContentVersion: 在 Steam 协议中传输的内容版本不匹配。
LK_Mod_k_EResultDataCorruption: 因数据状况欠佳或不可恢复而取消操作。
LK_Mod_k_EResultDisabled: 请求的服务已配置为不可用。
LK_Mod_k_EResultDiskFull: 磁盘空间不足，取消操作。
LK_Mod_k_EResultDuplicateRequest: 重复请求，操作已进行，忽略此请求。
LK_Mod_k_EResultExpired: 用户尝试访问的许可/玩家通行证已失效。
LK_Mod_k_EResultExpiredLoginAuthCode: 由于验证码失效，帐户登录被拒。
LK_Mod_k_EResultExternalAccountAlreadyLi: 外部帐户（PSN、Facebook 等）已链接至其他帐户，必须先显式请求替代/删除此链接。
LK_Mod_k_EResultExternalAccountUnlinked: 外部帐户（PSN、Facebook 等）未链接至 Steam 帐户。
LK_Mod_k_EResultHardwareNotCapableOfIPT: 用户硬件不支持英特尔身份保护技术（IPT）。
LK_Mod_k_EResultIOFailure: 出现一般 IO 失败。
LK_Mod_k_EResultIPLoginRestrictionFailed: 由于 IP 限制，登录失败。
LK_Mod_k_EResultIPTInitError: 英特尔身份保护技术（IPT）初始化失败。
LK_Mod_k_EResultIllegalPassword: 请求的新密码不被接受。
LK_Mod_k_EResultInvalidCEGSubmission: 提交至 CEG 服务器的文件无效。
LK_Mod_k_EResultInvalidLoginAuthCode: 由于验证码无效，帐户登录被拒。
LK_Mod_k_EResultInvalidState: 调用的对象处于无效状态。
LK_Mod_k_EResultItemDeleted: 我们尝试访问的物品已被删除。
LK_Mod_k_EResultLockingFailed: 为此操作获取访问锁定失败。
LK_Mod_k_EResultNoConnection: 您的 Steam 客户端没有连接后端。
LK_Mod_k_EResultNoMatch: 未找到与请求匹配的信息。
LK_Mod_k_EResultNoMatchingURL: 无与提供的值匹配的 URL。
LK_Mod_k_EResultNoMobileDevice: 帐户无相关联的移动设备。
LK_Mod_k_EResultParentalControlRestricte: 由于当前用户受家长控制限制，操作失败。
LK_Mod_k_EResultPasswordRequiredToKickSe: 您已经在别处登录，此缓存的凭据登录已失效。
LK_Mod_k_EResultPasswordUnset: 密码在服务器端未设置，无法验证。
LK_Mod_k_EResultPending: 请求正待处理，可能已在进程中或在等待第三方。
LK_Mod_k_EResultPersistFailed: 将更改写入数据存储失败。
LK_Mod_k_EResultRateLimitExceeded: 超出暂时性速率极限，稍后再试，与可能为永久性的 k_EResultLimitExceeded 不同。
LK_Mod_k_EResultRegionLocked: 由于地区限制，操作不能完成。
LK_Mod_k_EResultRemoteCallFailed: 远程或 IPC 调用失败。
LK_Mod_k_EResultRemoteDisconnect: 远程服务器已断开连接。
LK_Mod_k_EResultRemoteFileConflict: 由于本地与远程文件冲突，同步无法继续。
LK_Mod_k_EResultRequirePasswordReEntry: 用户不能完成操作，直到重新输入密码为止。
LK_Mod_k_EResultRestrictedDevice: 使用的设备未获执行此操作的许可。
LK_Mod_k_EResultRevoked: 访问已被撤销（用于被撤销的玩家通行证）。
LK_Mod_k_EResultSameAsPreviousValue: 新值与旧值相同。 用于安全问题及其答案。
LK_Mod_k_EResultServiceReadOnly: 此服务目前不接受内容更改。
LK_Mod_k_EResultServiceUnavailable: 请求的服务当前不可用。
LK_Mod_k_EResultSuspended: 长时间运行的操作已中止/暂停。 （如 内容下载。)
LK_Mod_k_EResultTimeNotSynced: 提供的时间在范围或容差之外。
LK_Mod_k_EResultTryAnotherCM: 当前 CM 不能服务发出请求的用户。用户应重试。
LK_Mod_k_EResultTwoFactorActivationCodeM: 双因素验证（Steam 令牌）激活码不匹配。
LK_Mod_k_EResultTwoFactorCodeMismatch: 双重验证（Steam 令牌）码不正确。
LK_Mod_k_EResultUnexpectedError: 发生了完全不曾预料的情况。
LK_Mod_k_EResultValueOutOfRange: 输入的值在可接收范围之外。

LK_Qualification_Growth_Desc:
<color=#lightgrey>人物在各个的命龄阶段中，根据成长类型的不同，所有资质也会有所变化…</color>

·均衡：任何命龄阶段中，所有资质均无变化
·早熟：出生时<color=#brightblue>资质增加15，至40岁为止，此影响会随命龄增长逐渐递减至10</color>；40岁后<color=#brightred>资质减少10，此影响会随命龄增长逐渐递增至20</color>
·晚成：出生时<color=#brightred>资质减少20，至30岁为止，此影响会随命龄增长逐渐递减至10</color>；30岁后<color=#brightblue>资质增加10，此影响会随命龄增长逐渐递增至30</color>

LK_SectShaolinDemonSlayer_HelpTips: 诛魔试炼共分九关，每关均需击败一位穷凶极恶的魔头残影;魔头残影怨念极深，各自身怀绝技;虽是与其残影观想作战，落败不至丧命;然试炼之中危机四伏，且观想之间身受拘囿，试炼者身随心变，仍会留下伤残;若力有不逮，或可暂且撤退，日后可承续当前进程再行试炼……
LK_SectZhujian_SpecialMerchant_AreaTip: The <color=#caravan>branch of Penta-Lake Commerce</color> which specializes in Western Region Treasures is located here...
LK_SectZhujian_SpecialMerchant_FavorDial: Treasures of the Five Lakes is located near the border, making it very hard for merchants to travel, so we do not send caravans, and there are no traveling merchants coming in and out of the store. If you want to get treasures from Western Regions, you will have to come to our store in person...

In the past, our Penta-Lake Commerce wanted to expand to Qinzhou, but we were repeatedly robbed, making it difficult for us to set up a branch. Fortunately, with the help of Taiwu, we were able to successfully open the Treasures of the Five Lakes...

Ever since we established a branch in Qinzhou, products everywhere have become more and more plentiful. With the establishment of the Treasures of the Five Lakes, our Penta-Lake Commerce has gained another foothold in this chaotic world...
LK_SectZhujian_SpecialMerchant_Introduce: All the items in this store are treasures from the Western Regions, which are hard to find elsewhere. If you need anything, please feel free to choose...

商会的好感度，影响商会出售的物品品级…
因相枢乱世，商会拥资源而自重，故需得到商会的认可，方能进行更多交易
LK_Shop_Item_Debt_Add: <color=#brightred>This item will reduce the number of items that can be purchased in the corresponding store...</color>
LK_Shop_Item_Debt_Repay: <color=#brightblue>This item will increase the number of items that can be purchased in the corresponding store...</color>
LK_Shop_Speak_Buy: Thank you for your patronage, you are welcome here at any time, feel free to come back...
LK_Shop_Speak_Buy_OverProgress: Given that it's you, this deal could be arranged. However, you must be prepared to owe quite a few favors. Should these favors pile up, I fear that even if our shop comes across rare items, we wouldn't dare to offer them so readily...
LK_Shop_Speak_ClickCharacter1: The trade caravan sells goods to the 「Taiwu」 heirs and also conducts business with various parties. With a broad influx of wealth, the merchant group can dispatch higher-level caravans...
LK_Shop_Speak_ClickCharacter2: The headquarters of the major merchant groups are established as rank seven, while their branches hold the position of rank six. They frequently dispatch trade caravans to various places...
LK_Shop_Speak_ClickCharacter3: Those who join the merchant group have most of their earnings funneled back to the headquarters...
LK_Shop_Speak_Debt: Although you and I have a few grudges, I do business with a clear heart, so i won't be selfish...
LK_Shop_Speak_Merchant_No_Money: Ah... I don't have enough money left. If you still want to continue selling items, I will no longer be able to pay the corresponding price...
LK_Shop_Speak_Remain1: Despite these turbulent times, our shop's business remains stable. Given that there is no strong relationship between you and our shop, unless it's an urgent situation, we cannot easily part with those precious items...
LK_Shop_Speak_Remain2: In these challenging times, resources are scarce. A merchant group, holding an abundance of resources and maintaining a monopoly, naturally commands a respected position in society...
LK_Shop_Speak_Sell: Not bad... not bad... If you ever find something as good as this, feel free to come back to me...
LK_Shop_Speak_Sell_Max_Count: My storage is full, and I can't accept any more treasures. Please come back later...
LK_Shop_Speak_Sell_OverProgress: Gratitude and favors come and go. Your Excellency brought me this thing, and it can be considered as repayment for your debts...
LK_Shop_Tog_Tip: Purchasing items that exceed the current Merchant Group's favor limit will reduce the number of items that can be purchased from this store level; This can be repaid by selling items that exceed the current Merchant Group's favor limit...
LK_Shop_Tog_Tip_DebtLimit: <color=#brightred>Due to your debt, you cannot purchase items of this level...</color>
LK_Shop_Tog_Tip_XiangshuLevelLimit: <color=#brightred>Due to the Xiangshu invasion limit, the Favor of a Merchant Group will no longer increase...</color>

UI_AdvanceMonthState_10: A world of turmoil and travel
UI_AdvanceMonthState_11: I don't see smoke and rain, I don't paint sad autumn
UI_AdvanceMonthState_12: Gossip is also ice and fire
UI_AdvanceMonthState_13: Disaster and happiness are difficult to anticipate, life or death are hard to know
UI_AdvanceMonthState_2: Birth, old age, sickness and death are the way of the world
UI_AdvanceMonthState_3: Demons are rampant, bandits are rampant
UI_AdvanceMonthState_4: Night Reading of Spring and Autumn
UI_AdvanceMonthState_5: Hidden gold and treasure external repair and internal conditioning
UI_AdvanceMonthState_6: It's not a thing to be treasured

UI_AdvanceMonth_Content:
进行月份更替可<color=#brightblue>自然恢复30精力…</color>

养精蓄锐，充足的休息会<color=#brightblue>提升下一个月的精力</color>！月份更替后，本月剩余的精力将会转化为下月的精力。

以逸待劳，充足的休息会<color=#brightblue>提升下一个月的恢复量</color>！月份更替时，本月剩余的精力将会提供额外的内息紊乱与基础属性恢复。

UI_EventEditor_Tip_ItemInsertString_Cont:
1、使用<>包含整个占位符标签信息
2、所有道具的占位符标签名都是 Item
3、key字段表示从参数盒获取该物品信息
4、key字段存在会使id字段和type字段失效
5、type字段和id字段必须总是成对出现
6、str字段表示该占位符替换为字符串
7、str字段可选值有Name和ColorName
8、sp字段表示该占位符替换为物品图标
9、sp字段的值总是Icon

UI_LegacyActivate_Content:
太吾复归，妖魔又起……
伏虞剑柄发出微微白光，似是转醒……
此后，每当太吾传人濒死，便须将伏虞剑柄传予他人，
以令他人继承太吾所有的遗物、记忆和功法，继承太吾之名……
继承太吾传人斩妖除魔的使命……

正是，满身不移光明志，薪火相传无尽时……

UI_NewGame_Tip_AttackSpeed_Content:
侵袭的速度越快，太吾村越容易因相枢的侵袭而覆灭。
<color=#E3C66DFF>（太吾村一旦覆灭将导致游戏失败。）</color>
UI_NewGame_Tip_BattleHard_Content:
战斗中敌人的实力与智能程度。
<color=#E3C66DFF>（战斗的难度越高，敌人的能力越强；而敌人的智能程度越高，就能进行越多额外的战斗行动，比如更擅长把握攻击和防守的距离与时机。）</color>
UI_NewGame_Tip_BehaviorLimit: Choices made in events will be limited based on different standpoint restrictions, for a more realistic Taiwu world. (i.e., if you have chosen the Kind standpoint, you're limited to Just, Kind and Even choices)

UI_NewGame_Tip_ChangeGoodness_Content: Drag to change the character's standpoint...

<color=#E3C66DFF>（人物的寿元长短不会影响游戏的难度评价。）</color>
<color=#E4504DFF>（此选项无法在游戏开始后变更！）</color>

UI_NewGame_Tip_RandomInherit_Content:
当太吾氏没有任何继承人时，是否出现随机的继承人以保证太吾氏得以延续。
<color=#E3C66DFF>（没有继承人将导致游戏失败！）</color>
UI_NewGame_Tip_RobberAmount_Content:
散布于世界各地的恶徒与外道的数量。
<color=#E3C66DFF>（恶徒与外道的数量越多，越容易遭遇袭击。）</color>
UI_NewGame_Tip_WorldPopulation:
人口数量决定了游戏内活跃npc的数量上限，npc数量越多，太吾世界越精彩。
<color=#E3C66DFF>（世界的人口数量越多需要的电脑性能越好。）</color>
<color=#E4504DFF>（此选项无法在游戏开始后变更！）</color>
UI_NewGame_Tip_WorldSituation_Content:
繁荣的世界将有利于太吾的发展。
但即使是最荒芜的世界，也能够逐渐恢复生机。
<color=#E3C66DFF>（世界的状况直接影响着世界中各个地点的各类资源的恢复量；在桃源难度下，采集资源时的资源收获量也会有所不同。）</color>

UI_Profession_ChangeProfession_Notify_5: After the aspiration is switched, you <color=#brightred>will not trigger Realizing Reincarnation</color> upon death. Please carefully consider whether you want to switch your aspiration.
